path.description: The folder where the file(s) will be uploaded to (only supported on strapi-provider-upload-aws-s3).

refId.description: The ID of the entry which the file(s) will be linked to

ref.description: The unique ID (uid) of the model which the file(s) will be linked to (api::restaurant.restaurant).

field.description: The field of the entry which the file(s) will be precisely linked to.

get.description: Redirects to provider login before being redirect to /auth/{provider}/callback

post.description: Returns a jwt token and user info
Returns a jwt token and user info

200.description: Returns a jwt token and user info
Returns a jwt token and user info
Returns a jwt token and user info

301.description: Redirects to the configure email confirmation redirect url

200.description: Returns email and boolean to confirm email was sent

roles.name: Public
roles.description: Default role given to unauthenticated user.

200.description: Returns ok if the role was create

role.name: Public
role.description: Default role given to unauthenticated user.

200.description: Returns ok if the role was udpated
Returns ok if the role was delete

role.name: X
role.description: Default role given to authenticated user.
